# to build:
#   mkdir uRPC/build
#   cd uRPC/build
#   cmake .. -DCMAKE_MODULE_PATH="C:/Users/Nicholas Palko/Documents/Development/cmake-modules" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release

# TODO
# - get proto's generated by make process
# - change linking based on DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE

cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 2.8)
project (uRPC)

find_package (Matlab REQUIRED)
find_package (ProtocolBuffers REQUIRED)
find_package (ZeroMQ REQUIRED)

add_subdirectory (src)
